item.title: 辉瑞上调年度利润预期
item.description: 受心脏病药物 Vyndaqel 和血液稀释剂 Eliquis 需求强劲的提振，美国制药商辉瑞公司周二公布了好于预期的第二季度业绩，并上调了全年盈利预期。【原文：U.S. drugmaker Pfizer raised its full-year profit forecast on Tuesday after reporting better-than-expected results for the second quarter, boosted by strong demand for its heart disease drug, Vyndaqel, and blood thinner, Eliquis.】

item.title: 瑞士总统赴美会谈以化解关税威胁
item.description: 瑞士政府表示，瑞士总统卡琳-凯勒-萨特（Karin Keller-Sutter）和商务部长居伊-帕梅林（Guy Parmelin）将于周二飞往华盛顿，试图避免美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）宣布对出口到美国的产品征收 39% 的关税。【原文：Swiss President Karin Keller-Sutter and Business Minister Guy Parmelin will fly to Washington on Tuesday, the government said, to try to avoid the 39% tariffs announced by President Donald Trump on exports to the United States.】

item.title: 卡特彼勒利润下降，警告称美国关税影响高达 15 亿美元
item.description: 卡特彼勒周二公布第二季度利润下降，原因是建筑设备需求低迷，并警告称 2025 年美国关税将带来高达 15 亿美元的成本损失。【原文：Caterpillar reported a lower second-quarter profit on Tuesday due to sluggish construction equipment demand and warned of up to $1.5 billion hit from costs related to U.S. tariffs in 2025.】

item.title: 收费相关收益创纪录，阿波罗利润超预期
item.description: 本周二，阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management）第二季度利润超出华尔街预期，与费用相关的收益和资本解决方案费用创下新纪录，反映出其投资策略的弹性。【原文：Apollo Global Management beat Wall Street expectations for second-quarter profit on Tuesday, setting new records for fee-related earnings and capital solutions fees that reflected the resilience of its investment strategy.】

item.title: 早间竞标：美联储起哄，Palantir飙升
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 巴西航空工业公司第二季度净亏损，认为美国关税不会造成实质性影响
item.description: 巴西飞机制造商巴西航空工业公司周二公布，第二季度调整后净亏损为 470 万美元，低于去年同期 8040 万美元的利润。【原文：Brazilian planemaker Embraer on Tuesday reported a second-quarter adjusted net loss of $4.7 million, down from a profit of $80.4 million a year earlier.】

item.title: 为什么铜能逃过美国的关税，而铝却不能？
item.description: 美国上周决定对精炼金属铜免征进口关税，这与早些时候对铝征收高额关税的举措形成鲜明对比，凸显了电力成本的核心重要性以及影响美国政策的游说态势。【原文：A U.S. decision last week to exempt refined copper metal from import duties is in contrast to an earlier move to levy steep duties on aluminium, and highlights the central importance of electricity costs and the lobbying dynamics shaping U.S. policy.】

item.title: 杜邦预计第三季度业绩高于预期，因电子产品和医疗保健需求强劲
item.description: 工业材料生产商杜邦公司周二预计，受益于电子和医疗保健业务的强劲增长，本季度收入和利润将高于华尔街预期，从而使其股价在盘前交易中上涨了 4%。【原文：Industrial materials maker DuPont on Tuesday forecast current-quarter revenue and profit above Wall Street estimates, benefiting from strength in its electronics and healthcare segments, sending its shares up 4% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 南非电信公司利润因用户增长和光纤服务而增长
item.description: 本周二，南非电信公司（Telkom）公布的季度核心利润增长了 6.5%，主要得益于用户增长和 "下一代网络"（NGN）产品的使用增加，因为该公司放弃了传统服务。【原文：South Africa's Telkom reported a 6.5% rise in quarterly core profit on Tuesday, helped by subscriber growth and increased use of its "next-generation network" (NGN) offerings as it ditched legacy services.】

item.title: 美联储降息押注增加，期指上扬；盈利成为焦点
item.description: 由于市场对美联储降息的预期增强，同时投资者对新一轮主要企业财报进行了评估，华尔街期货周二在上一交易日势头的基础上继续走高。【原文：Wall Street futures edged higher on Tuesday, building on momentum from the previous session as expectations for the Federal Reserve's interest rate cuts grew, while investors assessed a new round of major corporate earnings.】

item.title: 巴西 iFood 应用程序宣布投资 31 亿美元
item.description: 荷兰投资集团 Prosus 旗下的巴西食品配送应用 iFood 周二宣布，将在 2025 年 4 月至 2026 年 3 月期间在巴西直接投资 170 亿雷亚尔（约合 31 亿美元）。【原文：Brazilian food delivery app iFood, owned by Dutch investment group Prosus , announced on Tuesday direct investments of 17 billion reais ($3.1 billion) in the country between April 2025 and March 2026.】

item.title: 小型上市公司在新一轮加密货币淘金热中抢购以太币，尽管风险依然存在
item.description: 与比特币相比，一些公司更青睐以太币，将其作为对冲通胀的工具，因为这种加密货币在可负担性和可信度之间找到了最佳平衡点，同时又有强大的区块链骨干网作为支撑。【原文：Some companies are favoring ether over bitcoin as an inflation hedge as the cryptocurrency hits a sweet spot between affordability and credibility, while being underpinned by a strong blockchain backbone.】

item.title: 自动驾驶判决给特斯拉带来 "黑眼圈"，威胁马斯克的机器人出租车野心
item.description: 上周，特斯拉因 2019 年一辆配备自动驾驶系统的 Model S 发生致命车祸而被法院判决败诉，这可能会损害特斯拉扩大其新兴机器人出租车网络的计划，并加剧人们对其自动驾驶汽车技术安全性的担忧。【原文：A court verdict against Tesla last week, stemming from a fatal 2019 crash of an Autopilot-equipped Model S, could hurt its plans to expand its nascent robotaxi network and intensify concerns over the safety of its autonomous vehicle technology.】

item.title: 咨询公司称，华尔街交易员将在市场波动中获得更丰厚的奖金
item.description: 薪酬咨询公司 Johnson Associates 的季度报告显示，由于华尔街股票和债券交易员在动荡的市场中套现，今年他们的奖金有望飙升 10%至 30%。【原文：Wall Street stock and bond traders can expect their bonuses to jump 10% to 30% this year as they cashed in on turbulent markets, according to a quarterly report by compensation consultancy Johnson Associates.】

item.title: 独家报道：政府消息人士称，特立尼达与埃克森美孚就深水区块达成协议
item.description: 两位高级政府官员告诉路透社，特立尼达和多巴哥政府已同意将包括七个区块在内的超深海区域的油气勘探权授予美国石油巨头埃克森美孚公司。【原文：Trinidad and Tobago's government has agreed to award U.S. oil major ExxonMobil acreage in an ultra-deep area that includes seven blocks to explore for oil and gas, two senior government officials told Reuters.】

item.title: 威胁增加，美国公司为保护高管支出创纪录
item.description: 在过去八个月中，曼哈顿发生了多起袭击事件，造成两名知名企业高管遇害，为应对不断上升的威胁，美国公司正在花费创纪录的巨资保护其高管的安全。【原文：U.S. companies are spending record amounts to keep their executives safe in response to rising threats and the killings of two high-profile corporate officials in separate attacks in Manhattan over the last eight months.】

item.title: 特斯拉 7 月德国汽车销量减少一半以上
item.description: 德国道路交通机构 KBA 周二表示，尽管电池电动汽车的销量总体上有所增长，但特斯拉 7 月份在德国的销量减少了一半以上。【原文：Tesla's sales volume in Germany more than halved in July, the German road traffic agency KBA said on Tuesday, although sales of battery electric vehicles rose overall.】

item.title: 据《日经新闻》报道，Blackstone 将以约 34 亿美元收购日本 TechnoPro 公司
item.description: 据《日经商业日报》周二报道，Blackstone 计划以约 5000 亿日元（33.9 亿美元）的价格收购日本大型工程师招聘公司 TechnoPro Holdings。【原文：Blackstone plans to acquire major Japanese engineer staffing firm TechnoPro Holdings for about 500 billion yen ($3.39 billion), the Nikkei business daily reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 人工智能需求飙升推动预期升级，Palantir 股价大涨
item.description: Palantir Technologies 股价在周二收盘前上涨了 5%，此前政府和商业企业对其人工智能驱动的服务需求强劲，促使该公司上调了年度营收预期。【原文：Palantir Technologies shares rose 5% before the bell on Tuesday, after strong demand for its AI-powered services across governments and commercial businesses prompted an increase in its annual revenue forecast.】

item.title: 竞争加剧，JD.com 将推出五家折扣店
item.description: 中国零售商京东网计划在中国两个城市开设五家折扣超市，这标志着随着其核心电子商务市场竞争的加剧，京东网开始进军新的细分市场。【原文：Chinese retailer JD.com plans to open five discount superstores in two Chinese cities, marking its latest move into new segments as competition intensifies in its core e-commerce market.】

item.title: 美国钻井平台数量下滑超过效率提升，威胁陆上石油产出
item.description: 美国各地部署的石油和天然气钻井平台数量正在下降，这表明世界第一大石油生产国的陆上原油产量可能会在 2026 年初下降。【原文：The falling number of oil and gas rigs deployed across the United States is reaching a level that would indicate onshore crude output from the world's top producer could fall in early 2026.】

item.title: 日本芝浦公司在收购战中被列为国家安全核心企业
item.description: 日本芝浦电子公司（Shibaura Electronics）是一家技术制造商，正处于一场价值 6.3 亿美元的收购战的中心，财政部的一份此类公司名单显示，该公司已被正式列为国家安全的核心企业。【原文：Japan's Shibaura Electronics , a technology manufacturer at the centre of a $630 million takeover battle, has been formally classified as core to national security, a finance ministry list of such firms showed.】

item.title: 美国对欧盟商品征收 15%的关税是全面的--欧盟官员
item.description: 一位欧盟官员周二表示，欧盟商品在进入美国时面临的15%关税是全包的，包含了最惠国税率，这与其他一些与美国有交易的国家不同。【原文：The 15% tariff that European Union goods face when entering the United States is all-inclusive, incorporating the Most Favoured Nation Rate, unlike some other countries with deals with the U.S., an EU official said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 欧元区制造业采购经理人指数（PMI）显示，欧元区 7 月商业增长略有上升，但依然低迷
item.description: 周二的一项调查显示，欧元区 7 月份的商业活动增长速度略高于 6 月份，但由于需求下降，商业活动依然低迷。【原文：Business activity in the euro zone grew at a slightly faster pace in July than in June but remained sluggish as demand dipped, a survey showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 马自达预计美国关税将对其利润造成近 10 亿美元的冲击
item.description: 马自达汽车（Mazda Motor）周二表示，由于美国征收进口关税，该公司预计今年的营业利润将受到1,452亿日元（约合9.8702亿美元）的冲击。【原文：Mazda Motor said on Tuesday it expects a 145.2 billion yen ($987.02 million) hit to its operating profit this business year due to U.S. import tariffs, as the Japanese automaker rolled out measures to cushion the impact.】

item.title: 芯片初创公司 Oxmiq 推出 GPU 技术许可证
item.description: Oxmiq 实验室周二表示，该公司计划推出面向人工智能数据运算的可授权图形处理器技术。【原文：Oxmiq Labs said on Tuesday that it planned to launch licensable graphics processor tech geared for artificial intelligence data crunching.】

item.title: 关税混乱，亚美海运费将延续跌势
item.description: 业内专家表示，随着航运能力超过需求，以及关税和地缘政治紧张局势导致贸易路线发生变化，亚美海运费将在2025年进一步下降，尽管船舶改道有望限制一些损失。【原文：Asia-U.S. sea freight rates are set to drop further in 2025 as shipping capacity outpaces demand and trade routes shift due to tariffs and geopolitical tensions, though vessel rerouting is expected to limit some losses, industry experts said.】

item.title: 英国 Spectris 公司同意 KKR 提出的更高报价，收购战进入白热化阶段
item.description: 英国科学仪器制造商思百吉公司（Spectris）周二表示，已同意美国私募股权公司 KKR 提出的估值 48 亿英镑（64 亿美元）的更优惠报价，并撤回了对竞争对手 Advent 提出的更低报价的支持。【原文：British scientific instruments maker Spectris has agreed to a sweetened offer from U.S. private equity firm KKR valuing it at 4.8 billion pounds ($6.4 billion), it said on Tuesday, withdrawing its backing for a lower offer from rival suitor Advent.】

item.title: 帝亚吉欧预测年销售额增长持平，上调成本节约目标
item.description: 全球最大的烈酒生产商帝亚吉欧周二预测，包括美国关税的影响在内，2026 财年的有机销售额增长将与 2025 财年相近，并将成本节约目标上调至约 6.25 亿美元。【原文：Diageo , the world's biggest spirits maker, forecast on Tuesday fiscal 2026 organic sales growth to be similar to fiscal 2025 including the impact of U.S. tariffs, and raised its cost-savings target to about $625 million.】

item.title: 利润超预期，英国石油公司将审查资产和成本
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP）周二公布的第二季度利润轻松超过预期，该公司表示将审查其资产组合，并考虑进一步削减成本，以更好地为股东服务。【原文：BP will review its portfolio of assets and consider further cost cuts as part of a drive to do better for shareholders, the oil major said on Tuesday, as it reported a second-quarter profit that easily beat expectations.】
